parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Lights </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2 </name>=<value> Weapons </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets AI group option how to use gun lights. The string argument can be:
* <tt>"Auto"</tt> - Depends on combat mode 
* <tt>"ForceOn"</tt> - Always on
* <tt>"ForceOff"</tt> - Always off

<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature arma3 </title><part><name index="1"/><value> This syntax is for <template><title>arma3</title></template>. For <template><title>arma2</title></template> syntax, see [[enableGunLights Arma 2]].</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> group [[enableGunLights]] mode </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> group: [[Group]] or [[Object]] - the group forced to use gun lights. If unit is supplied as argument, unit's group is used  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> mode: [[String]] - <tt>"Auto"</tt>, <tt>"ForceOn"</tt>, <tt>"ForceOff"</tt> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_group [[enableGunLights]] "ForceOn";</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_unit [[enableGunLights]] "Auto";</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>_unit [[enableGunLights]] "ForceOff";</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[isFlashlightOn]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
